subject: Re: KGTMS website - The May 50K pop up
preview: Hi Shannen,Confirming we have updated the popup and its now live.

full_threads.body:
Hi Shannen,

Confirming we have updated the popup and its now live.

Hi Joel

Sorry we have changed the main image - can you please change it back to the girl in the green singlet like the attached? Please keep the text as it is currently though.

Once that's done, can you please make the pop up live?

Many thanks

Shannen



Shannen Chia

Community Fundraising Coordinator - Kiss Goodbye to MS

Hi Shannen,

Sure, all good. We have updated the text. Cheers!

Hi Joel

Sorry, one tiny edit - can you please change it to 'Are you here to register for The May 50K 2021?'

Once that's added, then it's ready to go! We are hoping to launch next week, so will let you know when to make it live 😊

Thanks so much

Shannen

Sure, we have updated the image. Let me know if this works for you? Please see the attached.

Hi Joel

Apologies for the delay.

There's been a change in hero images for the campaign - can you please replace the image with the one attached and revert the writing back to white?

Sorry for this.

Appreciate your help!

Shannen

Can we please change the logo to the black version attached and also change all the font to black, as well as the box around 'Go to Kiss Goodbye to MS site'?

Thank you

Shannen

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi team


Registrations for The May 50K will be going live in just over a week. Quite a few people usually get confused and register on our main KGTMS site instead of the The May 50K website. Can you please prepare the pop-up that redirects them to The May 50K site? I will have to confirm the exact date of when to apply it though.


I'm not 100% sure what the pop up looked like, can you please share that with me? If there was an image for it, we most likely need to update that.


Many thanks
Shannen

Shannen Chia

Community Fundraising Coordinator - Kiss Goodbye to MS
